title: El Costeno Fast Food LA
brief: A landing page for a local Colombian fast food place in Los Angeles. It's one of my favorite places to reconnect with Colombian culture and taste the best food in town.

title: Uniencuentros ~ Eventos Universitarios
brief: A web platform for university events and gatherings. I created this project to help my professor with his events organization and management, and to provide some value to his mission.

title: In Her Words ~ Blog
brief: A blog platform for sharing stories and insights.

title: Code Craft Guidelines
brief: A landing page for a coding guidelines platform.
